text: John Bridgeman is an American politician and real estate executive. He was a member of the North Carolina House of Representatives representing the 43rd District from 1999 to 2000. Bridgeman, a member of the Democratic Party, was elected mayor of Gastoniain November 2011 with 45 percent of the vote. He was re-elected in 2015 and voted out in 2017. == References == Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Democrats Category:American real estate businesspeople Category:Mayors of places in North Carolina Category:Gardner–Webb University alumni Category:University of North Carolina at Charlotte alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: John Bridgeman (American politician)
